description.value: You can withdraw into your shell as a minor action. Until you emerge, you gain a +4 bonus to your AC, and you have advantage on Constitution (Save) checks. However, while in your shell, you are considered @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}, your speed is 0 and you cannot be increased, you automatically fail Dexterity (Save) Checks, you can’t take reactions, and you cannot do anything besides emerge from your shell.
